title: Add ReadDiscreteInputsIT integration test
description: Create integration test for read discrete inputs command (rdi) following the pattern from ReadHoldingRegistersIT. Should include basic test and counter/interval test.

title: Implement ReadDiscreteInputsIT test class
description: Create integration test for Read Discrete Inputs (rdi) command following the patterns from ReadCoilsIT and ReadInputRegistersIT. Test should verify: 1) Basic single read operation with JSON output validation, 2) Multiple iterations with counter and interval flags, 3) Proper protocol message validation (function code 2), 4) Correct coil_table output format.

title: Implement testReadDiscreteInputs test method
description: Create basic test that: Sets up test server with discrete inputs at address 100 with pattern [true, false, true, true, false]; Executes 'rdi 100 5' command with JSON format; Validates 4 JSON output lines (info, sent protocol, received protocol, coil_table); Verifies function code 2 in protocol messages; Validates PDU format (request: 0200640005, response: 02010d); Confirms coil_table contains correct boolean values.

title: Implement testReadDiscreteInputsWithCounterAndInterval test method
description: Create polling test that: Sets up test server with discrete inputs at address 100; Executes 'rdi 100 5 -c 3 -i 0' command; Validates 10 JSON output lines (1 info + 3 iterations * 3 messages); Verifies each iteration has correct protocol messages with iteration field; Confirms all iterations return same discrete input values; Validates timestamp fields in all messages.

title: Run mvn clean verify to ensure tests pass
description: Execute Maven build with clean verify to ensure: Code compiles successfully; Spotless formatting check passes; All tests including new ReadDiscreteInputsIT pass; No test failures or build errors.

title: Add ReadCoilsIT integration test
description: Create integration test for read coils command (rc) following the pattern from ReadHoldingRegistersIT. Should include basic test and counter/interval test.

title: Add ReadInputRegistersIT integration test
description: Create integration test for read input registers command (rir) following the pattern from ReadHoldingRegistersIT. Should include basic test and counter/interval test.
